name: Flight Simulator Advanced
description:
• Feel what it's like flying inside the cockpit of a real aircraft.
• Interact with cockpit buttons, switches and levers.
• Push-back, taxi to runway, take-off, fly, land.

* Optimized for iPhone & iPad [iPhone 6S or better recommended] *

Main Features
---------------------
• Many aircrafts, including A320, B737, A330, A340 with a lot of liveries.
• Realistic physics/aerodynamics
• Ground controls (steering, brakes, pushback)
• Flight controls (roll, pitch, rudder) - [on-screen joystick / tilt phone].
• Autopilot (altitude, speed and heading hold)
• Different timemodes


Cockpit interactions
----------------------
• Start/shut down engines
• Control thrust amount
• Flaps
• Pushback
• Landing gear
• Autopilot (speed, heading & altitude hold)


Graphics
----------------------
• Realistic cockpit
• Realistic airport environment (buildings, taxiways, parking area with jetways, runways)
• Realistic terrain with satellite imagery and elevation
• Animated flaps/spoilers/ailerons/gear
• Volumetric clouds


Locations
----------------------
• Frankfurt (EDDF)
• Athens (LGAV)
• Dubai (OMDB)
• Manchester (EGCC)
• More in next versions


Realistic sound effects
-----------------------
• ATC chatter
• Engine sound effects (spool up, reverse thrust, idle)
• Other sound effects
• GPWS callouts (during landing)


Cameras
----------------------
• Cockpit
• External
• 2 Wing views
• Camera shake effects
